Data: Maharoof to Warner, 1 run bowled it short of a length on middle, worked off the hips behind square for a single
Maharoof to Wade, no run bowled on a good length on the off, defended towards point off the front foot

Maharoof to Wade, no run goodish length on leg stump, defended towards point from the crease

Dilshan to Wade, no run flighted on leg stump, driven straight towards midwicket
Dilshan to Wade, 1 run short ball outside off, rocks back and punches it towards deep cover for a single
Maharoof to Wade, no run bowled on a good length on middle, defended solidly in front of extra cover
Maharoof to Wade, 2 runs bowled it short on leg stump, worked away wide of fine leg, Wade sprints back for the second
Maharoof to Wade, no run pitched it up full on the off, driven on the up towards mid-off
Maharoof to Wade, no run bowled it slightly short on middle and off, defended towards point
Maharoof to Wade, 1 run shortish on the off, punched standing tall on the back foot through point for a single

Dilshan to Warner, 1 run pushed it off the front foot through extra cover into the deep for a single
Dilshan to Wade, no run tossed up on the off, driven straight to extra cover this time
Dilshan to Wade, 1 run drops it just wide of point for a quick single, thought of a second but there was none
Dilshan to Warner, no run shortish on middle from round the wicket, punched in the direction of midwicket
Dilshan to Warner, 1 run short of a good length on the off, taps it towards point for a single
Dilshan to Wade, 1 run bowled it full on middle, driven through towards long-off for a single
Maharoof to Wade, 1 run short, gives some width, it's slashed hard towards third man for a single
Maharoof to Warner, no run around a good length on the off, rocks on the back foot and knocks it towards point
Maharoof to Warner, no run ooh, a good length ball that bounced more than Warner would have liked, got it a little high on the bat as he went through with the shot but it landed short of extra cover
Maharoof to Warner, no run shortish delivery on leg stump and it strikes him high on the pads
Maharoof to Warner, 1 run short of a good length, punched towards deep cover for an easy single
Maharoof to Wade, no run slightly short of a good length, knocks it down towards point
Dilshan to Warner, no run shortish outside off, chops it down towards point where it's fielded well
Dilshan to Warner, no run a touch short again, cracked straight to point once more
Dilshan to Warner, no run keeps it flat, bowled on a good length, driven straight back to the bowler
Dilshan to Warner, no run straying on the pads, clips the pads as he tries to work it square
Dilshan to Warner, 1 run flighted on the off, pushed down towards long-off for a single
Dilshan to Wade, 1 run driven through the line towards long-off for a single again, a tidy over from Dilshan
Prasad to Wade, no run short of a good length on the off, rocks on the back foot and taps that towards cover
Prasad to Wade, no run shortish on middle and off, defended down towards point
Prasad to Wade, 1 run bowled it short on middle, pulled towards deep square leg for a single
Prasad to Warner, 2 runs short of a good length, Warner gets back and just jab-chips it over midwicket for a couple of runs
Prasad to Warner, 1 run pushed it quicker and a touch fuller, Warner still opts to go back and work it past midwicket for a single
Prasad to Wade, 1 run bowled it on a good length on middle, knocked down in the direction of square leg for a quick single
Dilshan to Wade, 3 runs a bit of flight on that one and it lands short outside off, Wade waits for it to turn away and slashes it behind point for three runs, Tharanga gave chase and dragged it in
Dilshan to Warner, 1 run slightly short on the off, pushed off the back foot past extra cover for a single
Dilshan to Wade, no run tossed up on middle, defended cautiously towards extra cover

Dilshan to Wade, 3 runs appeal for run-out, pushed off the front foot wide of extra cover, there is an attempt at a direct hit as Wade tries to steal a single to reach his half-century, Tharanga was the man, the ricohet off the stumps fetches them two more and takes Wade to 52, a solid knock from Wade, excel
Dilshan to Warner, no run short of a good length, pushed off the back foot to extra cover
Dilshan to Warner, no run cracked off the front foot towards point
Prasad to Wade, 2 runs width and bowled full, allows Wade to free his arms, he cracks that through extra cover into the deep for a couple of runs
Prasad to Wade, no run beaten, lovely delivery that was bowled on a good length and shot away to beat the outside edge
Prasad to Wade, 2 runs shortish outside off, it's cut away towards third man, he has to run across a few yards and Wade picks up a couple
Prasad to Wade, no run short and wide, tries to crash it through the covers, has to reach for it, misses
Prasad to Wade, no run bowled on a good length in the channel outside off, Wade shoulders arms to that one
Prasad to Wade, no run bowled it short outside off, chopped it down towards point
Dilshan to Warner, 1 run bowled it slightly short outside off, cracked it through to deep cover for a single
Dilshan to Wade, no run bowled it on a good length outside off, defended towards point
Dilshan to Wade, no run steps out of his crease, that was held back by Dilshan, defended into the off side
Dilshan to Wade, no run floating it towards middle, defended to extra cover
Dilshan to Wade, 1 run turned away behind square leg for a single, thinking of a second but it's not there
Dilshan to Warner, 1 run punched it down towards long-on off the back foot
Prasad to Warner, no run beaten, pushed it full outside off, Warner drove at that one inside the line, beaten
Prasad to Warner, 1 run clipped away off the pads towards fine leg for a single
Prasad to Wade, no run short of a good length, drops it down in front of slip
Prasad to Wade, no run pitched up outside off, bowled at 147kmph, good pace that, tried to crack that through point but couldn't get his bat to it
Prasad to Wade, 2 runs around a good length on the pads, turned away gently through midwicket and there's enough time for them to sprint back for the second
Prasad to Wade, no run bowled it on a good length on middle, defended off the back foot to mid-on
Kulasekara to Warner, FOUR runs pitched up on the off and he has drilled that past mid-off, Maharoof dives but in vain and the boundary fetches Warner his half-century
Kulasekara to Warner, no run lovely ball, pitched it up but got it to move away, Warner was eyeing that mid-off boundary again but was beaten by the movement
Kulasekara to Warner, 1 run shortish on leg stump, whipped towards deep square leg for a single
Kulasekara to Wade, no run short of a good length on the off, moves back and pushes it to point
Kulasekara to Wade, no run bowled it full on the off, driven straight towards mid-off, firm but straight
Kulasekara to Wade, no run slightly short on the off, knocks it down in front of point
Prasad to Warner, no run creamed, absolutely thrashed, but straight to the fielder, pitched up and he cracked it straight to mid-off where Kulasekara did the hard work of getting behind it
Prasad to Warner, FOUR runs no chance for him this time, was pitched on a length and he smote that through the line past the bowler, mid-off wasn't in range at all
Prasad to Warner, FOUR runs another one, Prasad bowling too full again, in the slot for Warner who powered that through mid-off once more, three deliveries of almost identical length and line
Prasad to Warner, no run angling in towards middle, defends it cautiously back towards the bowler

Prasad to Warner, SIX runs middled superbly, Dammika errs in length this time by bowling it short and Warner likes playing that shot, gets forward and pulls him powerfully over the long-on boundary, and it's caught by a spectator in the crowd
Prasad to Warner, no run short of a good length and it's chopped towards cover
Kulasekara to Wade, FOUR runs poor line given there is a short fine leg in place, low full toss on the pads and Wade flicks it away through square leg
Kulasekara to Wade, 1 run short of a good length on the off, chopped it down behind point for a single
Kulasekara to Warner, no run walked forward did Warner and Kula held it back, tried to jab it through square leg but it struck him on the thigh
Kulasekara to Warner, no run bowled it on a good length on middle, Warner moved back and defended it to extra cover
Kulasekara to Warner, 1 run pushed it full on leg stump, Warner plays it down to long-on and wants the second but Wade sends him back a little belatedly, Warner dives to make it back

Kulasekara to Wade, OUT An outstanding catch by Herath, for a moment it seemed Wade had struck it cleanly to send it over the ropes but it wasn't timed as well as initially thought, Herath was at long-on and Wade had enough on it to get it past him as he was standing a few yards inside the ropes, Herath thou
Malinga to Watson, no run short of a length outside off, cut down straight to point
Malinga to Watson, FOUR runs thick outside edge, short of a good length outside off and Watson pushes at that one inside the line, rolls down the third man boundary past slip
Malinga to Watson, 1 run guided off the back foot with an open face
Malinga to Warner, SIX runs Six, Malinga bowls it short on middle with a fine leg up, Warner stays his ground and pulls it well behind square and it has enough on it to clear the ropes, just about
Malinga to Warner, no run slower one bowled on a good length outside off, pushed through to extra cover
Malinga to Warner, 1 run slower one bowled short outside leg stump, works it to short fine where Herath fumbles, allowing Warner a quick single
Dilshan to Warner, no run bowled it on a good length on the off, pushed it towards extra cover
Dilshan to Warner, no run angling in towards middle, defended on the off side with bat close to pad

Dilshan to Warner, 1 run flighted on leg stump, driven down the ground to long-on for a single
Herath to Warner, no run starts from round the wicket, goodish length on leg stump, holds its line, defended back to the bowler
Herath to Warner, no run pitched up on middle, driven straight towards extra cover
Herath to Warner, 2 runs short of a good length, does well, giving himself some room and delicately guiding it past point for a couple of runs
Herath to Warner, no run slightly short on leg stump, punched towards extra cover, Warner refuses the single
Herath to Warner, no run floating it on leg stump, played gently towards midwicket
Herath to Warner, no run fired it quick outside leg stump, Warner went for the sweep, missed, was rapped on the pads
Dilshan to Watson, no run bowled it on a good length, plays it back to the bowler
Dilshan to Watson, 1 run short, Watson pulls that past midwicket for a single in the deep
Dilshan to Warner, 2 runs short outside off, smacked off the back foot past extra cover for a couple in the deep
Dilshan to Warner, 1 run flighted on middle, driven towards long-off for a single

Herath to Warner, no run short on middle and off, pushed off the baqck foot to cover
Herath to Warner, no run quicker through the air, slightly short outside off, played it towards point
Herath to Warner, no run bowls it short on middle, punched straight to extra cover
Herath to Warner, 1 run flighted on the off, pushed down the ground to long-off for a single

Dilshan to Warner, 1 run shortish on middle, worked away off the back foot through square leg

Herath to Watson, 2 runs full toss on middle, drilled down the ground towards long-on, Malinga dives to his left to cut that off
Herath to Watson, 1 run worked away behind square into the deep for a single
Herath to Warner, no run short on the off, slapped it back down the pitch towards the bowler
Herath to Warner, 1 run in the slot on leg stump, struck hard, uppishly, towards long-on, just the single

Dilshan to Warner, 2 runs angling on leg stump, worked gently behind square, enough time to come back for the second
Dilshan to Warner, 1 run clipped into the leg side for another single
Maharoof to Warner, 2 runs slower one bowled on a good length, steered it wide of point for a couple of runs
Maharoof to Warner, no run punched that one through the line towards mid-off
Maharoof to Warner, 1 run slightly short on leg stump, turned it wide of midwicket for a single
Maharoof to Watson, 1 run short on middle, rolls his wrists over that one to play it to deep square leg
Maharoof to Warner, no run slower one bowled short outside off, mistimes a punch to extra cover
Maharoof to Warner, 1 run stroked that off the front foot on the up wide of mid-off for a single
Kulasekara to Warner, 1 run pitched up on middle, driven down the ground to long-on for a single
Kulasekara to Watson, 1 run bowled on a good length, struck back to Kulasekara who palms it off towards mid-off, a hint of bleeding there, struck him on the webbing
Kulasekara to Warner, no run sliding it on a good length just outside leg stump, struck on the pads as he tries to clip it square
Kulasekara to Warner, no run short of a good length on the off, punches it back towards the bowler
Kulasekara to Warner, 1 run run-out attempt, missed the stumps did Jaywardene who took aim from midwicket, Warner tried for the single but would probably have been short had that hit
Kulasekara to Watson, no run an excellent over, this, short of a good length and Watson just taps it to point
Maharoof to Warner, 1 run mistimes a drive wide of extra cover, Jayawardene dives full length and keeps them to just a single, raises the 50 stand

Maharoof to Watson, OUT Watson goes, it's been a quiet Powerplay so far, that landed on leg stump, was a slower ball, tried to flick it square but ended up playing uppishly and it appeared to come off the top edge as well, Thirimanne ran in from deep square leg and took a safe catch
Maharoof to Warner, no run short of a good length on the off, punched towards cover from the crease

Maharoof to Warner, FOUR runs edged and four, short and wide, there to cut, gets a thick under-edge that beats Sangakkara and rolls down the third-man boundary to bring up his first ODI hundred, punches the gloves and celebrates with a leap while reaching the other end, a big landmark for Warner
Maharoof to Warner, no run short and slow, slapped but straight to extra cover
Maharoof to Warner, 1 run eases that off the front foot through the line to long-off
Kulasekara to Warner, FOUR runs Kula gives Warner some width and he doesn't waste it, slashes it hard through point for a boundary
Kulasekara to Warner, no run yorker length on middle, a good comeback, Warner can only dig it out in front of cover
Kulasekara to Warner, no run bowled on a good length, Warner made room to that one and punched it towards cover

Kulasekara to Warner, 2 runs full on leg stump, driven down the ground to long-on, Malinga runs in and throws at the striker's end, a run-out attempt, Christian would have been out had Malinga hit direct
Kulasekara to Warner, no run low full toss on the off, dug out towards Dilshan at point

Kulasekara to Warner, FOUR runs bisects the gap this time between mid-off and extra cover, that was pitched up, Kula was aiming or another one in the blockhole but it didn't quite work out this time, drilled by Warner for a boundary

Maharoof to Christian, FOUR runs Christian's been fortunate this innings, that one nipped back in and Christian was beaten through the gate, it took the inside edge and rolled down the fine-leg boundary
Maharoof to Christian, 1 run slower one angling in on leg stump, tickled past square leg for a single
Maharoof to Warner, 2 runs bowls a low full toss outside off, Warner made some room to steer that, ended up slicing it over point for a couple of runs
Maharoof to Warner, 1 run slower one bowled short outside off, punched past cover for a single
Maharoof to Christian, FOUR runs struck hard and over the bowler's head, pitched up and Christian drove that powerfully through the line, beat long-on who ran across but couldn't cut it off
Maharoof to Christian, no run slower one bowled short on middle, tapped into the leg side towards midwicket
Herath to Warner, 2 runs floating it on leg stump, driven past midwicket into the deep for a couple of runs
Herath to Warner, 1 run slightly short on middle, chops it wide of point for one more
Herath to Christian, 1 run flighted on middle and off, driven past midwicket, who fumbles, for a single
Herath to Warner, 1 run on middle, fullish, pushed through the off side for a single
Herath to Christian, no run on a good length just outside off, defended in front of point
Herath to Christian, no run some turn there, landed short on leg and spun towards middle, drops it down in the leg side
Prasad to Warner, no run yorker first up, excellent delivery, in the blockhole on leg stump and Warner can only push it back to the bowler
Prasad to Warner, FOUR runs superbly hit, slower one and Warner picked it, was a long hop and Warner smashed it over midwicket for a one-bounce four
Prasad to Warner, 1 run bowled it full on middle, that was driven down to long-off for a single

Prasad to Christian, OUT Christian goes! Reiffel upholds the appeal, bowled on a good length and it nipped back in, Christian walked into the shot, got a faint inside edge and Sangakkara dived to his left to take a good low catch
Prasad to Hussey, no run bowled it full outside off, reaches for it and drives it straight to extra cover
Prasad to Hussey, 1 run full outside off, cracked firmly towards deep cover for a single to retain the strike

Herath to Hussey, OUT David Hussey's gone! Tossed up and Hussey was drawn into playing the drive, a soft dismissal in the end, pushes it straight back to the bowler who takes it sharply, timing his jump well
Herath to Clarke, 2 runs Herath bowls a short ball on leg stump, Clarke pulls that really fine, two for Clarke
Herath to Clarke, 1 run comes down the track and drives it down to long-on for a single
Herath to Warner, 2 runs slower, short on the off, cut down towards deep point for a couple of runs
Herath to Warner, no run bowled short on the off, punched back towards the bowler
Herath to Warner, 1 run worked away off the back foot in the deep for a single
Prasad to Warner, 1 run pitched up outside off, played towards long-off for a single
Prasad to Clarke, 1 run Clarke gets across to a straight delivery from Prasad, works it past midwicket for a single
Prasad to Warner, 1 run pushed it full on middle, driven towards long-off for a single
Prasad to Clarke, no run short of a good length on the off, defended towards the bowler
Prasad to Clarke, no run full and quick outside off, Clarke went after that one, looking to drive it through extra cover, missed
Prasad to Clarke, FOUR runs that is smashed, gets it in the middle this time, similar delivery to the previous one and Clarke plays it much straighter, caressing it to beat Malinga's drive at mid-off
Herath to Warner, 1 run short on middle, punched it towards long-on for a single
Herath to Clarke, no run tossed up, pushed off the front foot towards midwicket
Herath to Clarke, FOUR runs Clarke seizes the length early, waiting for it to turn away and cutting it uppishly but safely behind point for a boundary
Herath to Clarke, 1 run dances down the track this time and flicks it through square leg for a single
Herath to Warner, 1 run pushed past extra cover into the deep for a single
Herath to Clarke, no run flighted on middle, driven straight towards midwicket
Malinga to Warner, 1 run slower one bowled full on middle, cutting away, gets a thick outside edge as he tries to play it through the line, a single to third man
Malinga to Clarke, no run slower one bowled short outside off, dabbed it in front of point
Malinga to Clarke, FOUR runs deliberately done, Malinga continues to go for runs, bowled it full and Clarke delicately opened the face to guide it wide of third man
Malinga to Clarke, 2 runs slower one bowled full outside off, steers that into the ground and over point for a couple of runs
Malinga to Clarke, 2 runs slower one bowled on middle, gets across to play it square for a couple more runs
Malinga to Clarke, no run played straight to Dilshan at point, full outside off and he square-drives it but straight to the fielder
Herath to Warner, no run quicker ball bowled outside leg stump, tried to work it square, was struck on the pads
Herath to Warner, 1 run firmly hit but deep midwicket cuts it off, driven all along the ground
Herath to Clarke, 1 run angling in towards leg, turns it around for a single
Herath to Warner, 1 run flighted on leg stump, drives it down the ground to long-on for a single
Herath to Clarke, 1 wide fires it down the leg side and it's called a wide
Herath to Clarke, 1 run comes down the track and tickles it fine for a single
Herath to Warner, 1 run short ball outside off, cracked off the back foot towards deep cover to keep strike
Malinga to Warner, 1 run slower one from Malinga, Warner tries to smack him through the line, gets a thick outside edge and it falls short of third man
Malinga to Clarke, FOUR runs Clarke's turn to get the outside edge this time, the slower one again and Clarke, too, had planned to go downtown, got a thick edge and to the third-man boundary

Malinga to Clarke, OUT Malinga gets a wicket, finally, a slower one again and Clarke, looking to go over midwicket this time, mistimed the attempted pull and Jayawardene took a well-judged catch running to his right from midwicket
Malinga to Warner, 1 run slower one, gets to his 150 with a dab wide of point for a single, he likes scoring big
Malinga to Hussey, no run slower one bowled short on leg stump, struck him on the glove as he tried to work it around
Malinga to Hussey, 2 runs slower one again, the offcutter, guided behind point for two runs by Hussey
Kulasekara to Warner, 2 runs hit hard, was a low full toss on the off, smacked wide of long-off for a couple of runs, they've runs these twos brilliantly today
Kulasekara to Warner, 1 run walks across and taps that fullish delivery through midwicket for a single
Kulasekara to Hussey, 1 run Hussey flicks that good-length ball past midwicket for a single
Kulasekara to Warner, 2 runs that's gone through Kulasekara, bowled it full and Warner drilled it past the bowler, wide of long-on, for two more
Kulasekara to Warner, 1 run pitched up and he swings that towards deep square leg for a single

Kulasekara to Hussey, 2 runs good length on middle, comes down the track and gets it past midwicket, Warner calls for the second and makes it back in time, excellent stamina, brings up the 300 for Australia
Malinga to Warner, FOUR runs Malinga's bleeding runs today, pitched up, in the slot for Warner and it's hammered back past the bowler
Malinga to Warner, 2 runs another one bowled full, made room and sliced that over extra cover for a couple of runs
Malinga to Warner, 1 run yorker length this time, almost but not quite, dug out wide of cover for a single
Malinga to Clarke, no run Clarke connects, and does so really well, it was bowled full on middle, Clarke made room and creamed that but straight to mid-off
Malinga to Clarke, 1 run slower one bowled short, pulled through square leg for a single
Malinga to Warner, no run slightly short outside off, dabs it off the back foot towards point
Maharoof to Clarke, FOUR runs low full toss on leg stump, a poor ball given fine leg is up, clipped away past that fielder for four more
Maharoof to Clarke, 2 runs pitched up outside off this time, Clarke steps out to drive that wide of long-off for two more
Maharoof to Clarke, 1 run low full toss outside off this time, driven to long-on for a single to raise the 50-stand
Maharoof to Warner, FOUR runs superbly done by Warner, smart cricket, third man is up, that was a slower one, he made room and just placed it between point and short third
Maharoof to Warner, 3 runs short outside off and this time he cuts it wide of point and Clarke runs superbly, calling for the third and making it in time
Maharoof to Clarke, 2 runs bowled it full outside off, driven wide of long-off for two more, 16 off the over, Australia are charging
Malinga to Warner, 1 run slower one bowled short, slapped uppishly towards long-off for a single
Malinga to Hussey, no run bowled it full outside off, Hussey made room to launch that over extra cover but couldn't connect
Malinga to Hussey, SIX runs superbly timed, got under it this time, was a length ball and right in the slot, he made room and lofted it cleanly over the long-off boundary
Malinga to Hussey, no run the slower one and Hussey is into the pull too early, misses out as he tries to slog it over midwicket
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run length ball again, driven hard but to long-off where Dilshan fields
Malinga to Warner, 1 run Warner gets an inside edge on the thigh as he tries to swing that back to Melbourne, just a single in the end
Prasad to Warner, 2 runs full toss and it's clubbbed towards the bowler, Dhammika holds his hand out and is smacked, got struck on the palm, all's well now, just a couple in the end
Prasad to Warner, 1 run a mistimed pull to midwicket, a quick single taken
Prasad to Hussey, SIX runs Hussey has several such hits to his name, a length ball from Dhammika and it's swung miles over the deep midwicket fence
Prasad to Hussey, 1 run slapped to Jayawardene at extra cover at the edge of the circle, pinches a quick single
Prasad to Warner, 2 runs smashed down the ground to long-on and Hussey makes it back well in time, he's quick
Prasad to Warner, OUT bowled'im! Was the offcutter, landed on leg and cut away as he tried to pull that over midwicket, missed and the stumps were pegged back

Warner almost batted out the 50 overs, Australia are on top with an imposing score thanks to Warner's knock. There is some swing for the bowlers and some movement, and Sri Lanka face a difficult task to chase this down. Wade led the way with an attacking start and Warner dropped anchor to set up this total. Join us
Tillakaratne Dilshan and Mahela Jaywardene are out in the middle, we are set for the chase
Lee to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 wide Brett Lee starts with one down the leg side
Lee to Mahela Jayawardene, no run full swinging and wide, Jayawardene is tempted by that one, looks to drive through the off but is beaten
Lee to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run on legstump, Mahela looks to clip it to the leg side, rolls off the thigh pad towards backward square leg
Lee to Dilshan, 1 run pitched up and on off stump, a crisp drive towards extra cover by Dilshan, a diving stop there by Doherty

Lee to Mahela Jayawardene, no run swinging and full outside off once more from Lee, this time Mahela connects well, crunches it towards cover, Michael Hussey gets in the way to cut off any chance of a run
Lee to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run back of a length and outside off, Mahela waits on the back foot and calmly steers it towards third man for a single
Lee to Dilshan, 1 wide another wide one down the leg side
Lee to Dilshan, 1 run length ball heading for off, defended to the leg side for a single to end the over
Hilfenhaus to Dilshan, FOUR runs overpitched by Hilfenhaus, whipped nonchalantly for a four to the midwicket boundary, Dilshan doesn't need a sighter
Hilfenhaus to Dilshan, no run wonderful comeback from Hilfenhaus, short of a length and seams away a touch, Dilshan goes for an on-the-up drive but is beaten
Hilfenhaus to Dilshan, 1 run a tight single there, on the pads, Dilshan defends it towards square leg for a run, Mahela responds to the call early

Hilfenhaus to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run Mahela charges down the ground and looks to launch the ball over extra cover, gets a thick outside edge and the ball soars towards third man, luckily for Sri Lanka it doesn't carry to the fielder there
Hilfenhaus to Dilshan, 1 wide slides this down the leg side for another free run
Hilfenhaus to Dilshan, no run a well-timed drive from Dilshan, not so well placed, towards cover

Hilfenhaus to Dilshan, FOUR runs an adventurous shot from Dilshan, shuffles across and whips the ball over midwicket, not as a clean a hit as the one he began the over with, but still has the legs to beat the chasing fielder to the rope
Lee to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run Lee bowls on a good length, Jayawardene just drops it in front of extra cover and steals a quick single
Lee to Dilshan, FOUR runs that's gone past fine leg, banged in short on leg stump and he pulls it fine, lands just short of the ropes, a one bounce four
Lee to Dilshan, 1 run turns it past mid-on for a quick single
Lee to Mahela Jayawardene, no run beaten as that one nips back in, lands on a good length and shoots in to beat Mahela through the gate
Lee to Mahela Jayawardene, no run drops that short on the off stump, knocks it down into the off side, thinks of a single but Dilshan sends him back
Lee to Mahela Jayawardene, no run bowled on a good length on the off, defended solidly into the leg side off the back foot
Hilfenhaus to Dilshan, FOUR runs that flew off the bat, slashed really hard by Dilshan, took the outside edge and beat Lee at third man to he boundary
Hilfenhaus to Dilshan, no run appeal for a catch, Dilshan dances down the track and tries to whip it through the leg side, tried to flick it, it clipped the pad on the way to the keeper, the back pad
Hilfenhaus to Dilshan, no run short of a good length on the off, stands tall and taps it towards point
Hilfenhaus to Dilshan, 1 leg bye angling towards the pads, tries to flick it fine, brushes the pads and they get a leg bye
Hilfenhaus to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs beautifully picked, landed slightly short on middle and leg and Jayawardene shuffled across a hint to pick it over square leg
Hilfenhaus to Mahela Jayawardene, no run came down the pitch, aiming to take it off a length and drive it through the covers but it moved away after pitching, missed
Lee to Dilshan, 1 run fires it full on middle, flicked away towards fine leg for a single
Lee to Mahela Jayawardene, 2 runs Jayawardene does it nicely, was a slower ball and he just moved away to chip it over the covers for a couple of runs
Lee to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs outstanding from Jayawardene, Lee drags it short and Jayawardene gets into position early to pull it over square leg
Lee to Sangakkara, no run short of a good length on the off, defended off the back foot to point
Lee to Sangakkara, no run bowls that on a good length on the off, pushed through to mid-off
Pattinson to Dilshan, no run dropped it short on leg stump and he pulls it fine but can't get it past the short-fine fielder
Pattinson to Dilshan, 1 run angling in towards leg stump and going beyond, tried to flick that over midwicket, was struck on the pads
Pattinson to Sangakkara, no run short of a good length, gets on the back foot and guides it towards point
Pattinson to Sangakkara, 3 runs that's a trademark Sangakkra drive, pitched up and he just eased it through extra cover for three runs
Pattinson to Dilshan, 1 run back of a length on middle, mistimes an attempted pull, a single towards midwicket
Pattinson to Sangakkara, 3 runs lovely timing, just a flick, bowled full on middle and leg and he squeezes it past midwicket for three more runs
Lee to Sangakkara, 1 run bowled on a good length on the off, gets forward, dabs it into the leg side and takes a single
Lee to Dilshan, no run short of a length outside off, punched off the back foot towards point

Lee to Dilshan, FOUR runs the slower ball, bowled short, Dilshan had committed himself to playing the pull, didn't pick the change of pace but was fortunate, got a top-edge over the keeper's head for a boundary
Lee to Dilshan, no run bowled it short outside off, slapped it straight to point
Lee to Dilshan, no run a good length ball that cut away, Dilshan played it from the crease, defending it towards point
Pattinson to Sangakkara, no run A flowing drive from Sangakkara, that goes straight to mid-off
Pattinson to Sangakkara, 2 runs around a good length on the off, worked past square leg, Lee gathers and returns a powerful throw but Sanga has made it back
Pattinson to Sangakkara, no run angling it away from the left-hander, Sangakkara opts to leave it be
Pattinson to Sangakkara, FOUR runs gifts him with some width and Sanga cashes in, flaying it through point and cover, a square-drive, for a boundary
Pattinson to Sangakkara, FOUR runs poor ball, a short ball down the leg side and Sanga helps it on its way to the fine-leg boundary

Pattinson to Sangakkara, FOUR runs four more, streaky this time, pitched up outside off, tried to drive it square but ended up getting a thick inside edge past the keeper for four more, three in a row
Watson to Chandimal, no run in the channel outside off, a hint of away movement, Chandimal lets it go
Watson to Chandimal, no run ooh, a touch too early in closing the face there, almost offered a catch to the bowler, landed just short of Watson in his follow through
Watson to Chandimal, 1 run a thick outside off, bowling on a good length, moved away after pitching, a single to third man
Watson to Sangakkara, no run getting some swing, gets forward and plays it towards extra cover

Watson to Sangakkara, 1 leg bye appeal for lbw, that swung back in, the interesting thing to see is whether that struck him just outside the line, may have just done that, Reiffel thinks so, landed around off stump and struck Sanga on the back pad. In fact, it would have gone over
Watson to Chandimal, no run bowled it full on the off, defended off the front foot to extra cover
Doherty to Sangakkara, 1 run outside leg stump, tickled past that short square leg fielder, who misfields
Doherty to Chandimal, no run bowls on a good length outside off, defended in front of cover

Doherty to Chandimal, no run floating it on the off, drives it back towards the bowler
Doherty to Chandimal, no run short, waiting for it to turn away, slaps it straight to point
Doherty to Chandimal, no run shortish, turning away off a good length, swats it straight to cover
Watson to Sangakkara, no run short of a good length just outside off, left alone to the keeper

Watson to Sangakkara, no run appeal for caught-behind, Wade went up immediately, some swing for Watson helping him here, lands on a good length and moves in, Sangakkara didn't get a bat to it, clipped the thigh on the way to the keeper
Watson to Sangakkara, no run bowled it full on the off, knocked down into the off side
Watson to Sangakkara, no run in the channel outside off and that one holds its line, Sanga lets it go
Watson to Sangakkara, 1 run some inward movement again, bowled full, pushed wide of midwicket for a single

Doherty to Sangakkara, no run turning in from a good length on the off, gets a stride out and defends

Doherty to Chandimal, 1 run ooh, was almost deceived by the flight, tossed up and he came forward but not quite to the pitch, went through with the shot and pushed it uppishly towards long-off
Watson to Chandimal, no run bowls it full on the off, a hint of outsiwng there for Watson, pushed it cautiously towards extra cover
Watson to Chandimal, no run lands on a length on off and middle, defended solidly towards mid-off
Watson to Chandimal, no run driven firmly, gets to the pitch this time and plays it through the line, fielded well at extra cover
Watson to Chandimal, FOUR runs short ball on middle and Chandimal likes playing that shot, first boundary in some time, more than four overs, rocks back and pulls it square
Watson to Chandimal, no run swinging away just a hint, follows the ball this time and taps it towards point
Watson to Chandimal, no run jagged back in and Chandimal got an inside edge as he went across to that one

Watson to Sangakkara, no run goodish length on the off, pushes it towards extra cover off the front foot

Pattinson to Kulasekara, 1 wide slides that down the leg side, called a wide

Christian to Prasad, FOUR runs Sri Lanka are still in this, pitched up outside off and Prasad earns four lucky runs thanks to a thick outside edge to the third-man boundary
Christian to Prasad, 3 runs full toss outside off, that is sliced over point and Tharanga sprints quickly for the third and makes it in time

Christian to Upul Tharanga, 2 runs Tharanga makes room and cracks that over cover for a couple of runs, the throw is to the bowler's end, Christian collects and fires it down the striker's end and raps Wade on the inside of the knee, that must hurt and he is in some pain, a direct hit would have found him sh
Christian to Upul Tharanga, 1 run pitched it full on the off, driven down towards long-on for a single
Christian to Prasad, FOUR runs Dhammika Prasad cashing in this time, pitched up and he smacks it hard over the bowler's head to beat Pattinson at long-on
Christian to Prasad, 1 run pitched up, squeezes that one through to deep point for a single
Watson to Prasad, 1 run slower one bowled short outside off, drops it in front of point for a single
Watson to Upul Tharanga, 2 runs slower one again, pushed back hard past the bowler towards long-on for a couple of runs
Watson to Upul Tharanga, 1 run a full toss that's smacked to midwicket, they try to steal a single, a run-out chance missed as Doherty misses, one more
Watson to Prasad, 1 run slower one again, tickled through square leg for a single
Watson to Prasad, 1 run slower one, pushed away into the off side for a quick single
Lee to Prasad, SIX runs Prasad, you beauty! That's a Sehwagesque smack over the covers, good length ball, he made room and dispatched it with utter disdain over deep cover
Lee to Prasad, 1 run yorker length on middle, defended in front of midwicket for a quick single
Lee to Herath, 2 runs full toss, superbly timed, two more, Herath slipped while running and that prevented the third, just a punch over the covers
Lee to Herath, 1 wide a wide down the leg side, Lee errs in line, one more to the score
Lee to Herath, 1 run ooh, short ball and he jabbed it uppishly, landed just wide of Clarke at midwicket, just the single
Lee to Prasad, 1 run low full toss, Prasad pushes that firmly for a single towards Clarke at extra cover
Lee to Herath, 1 run short ball, rocks back and pulls it in front of square for a single
Watson to Herath, 1 run back of a length, chopped to point for a single, 300 comes up for Sri Lanka, the last 100 runs took only 56 deliveries

Watson to Prasad, no run more frenzy in the middle, a slower ball, Prasad wanted to work that to the leg side, he had shuffled across the stumps off the pad towards the keeper, Prasad wanted a single and hared off, the non-striker didn't, Wade attempts to throw down the stumps, Prasad has to dive back
Watson to Prasad, 1 run aims for the yorker, ends up a full toss outside off, slapped towards point, lands just short of the fielder

Watson to Herath, OUT Watson has struck, Herath is dismissed as he goes for his favourite slog shot, a length delivery is struck well by Herath, but Doherty had cleverly been placed well short of the rope, it ends up as a simple catch, only one wicket in hand now, Malinga was off-colour with the ball can he
Watson to Prasad, 1 run a slower ball outside off, poked to the off side
Watson to Malinga, no run a length ball outside off, driven towards cover, they don't go for the single, Prasad will be on strike next over, 20 needed off 12
Lee to Prasad, 1 run bowled it full on middle, flicked it square for just the single
Lee to Malinga, no run swings at that one, just a fraction outside off but makes no contact, a dot ball for Australia
Lee to Malinga, 1 run full and he tries to smash that down the ground, ends up getting a thick outside edge towards third man, lands to him on the bounce, Pattinson didn't go for it
Lee to Prasad, 1 run Prasad swings that straight to deep square leg, fullish on middle and he struck it well but found the fielder

Lee to Malinga, 1 bye superb yotker from Lee, Malinga could not bring his bat down in time and could only sneak a bye, Prasad stole the bye running at the danger end and Lee collected Wade's throw and aimed inaccurately at the non-striker's end
Lee to Prasad, no run another miss, pitched up outside off and Prasad had a wild swing at that one, wanted the bye but Malinga sent him back, rightly, a dot ball, the pressure grows on Sri Lanka
Watson to Malinga, no run A slower legcutter that Malinga fails to connect, had a wild swing but couldn't get his bat to it

Watson to Malinga, OUT Another slower one, Malinga swings it high but not far enough and finds deep square leg where Michael Hussey judges it well, Australia win the first final. Struck that really high did Malinga, didn't get hold but he had no choice but to go for it. Clarke heaves a sigh of relief, his te

That's all from us here folks, many thanks for tuning in and sending us your feedback. It was a riveting first final though it didn't appear so riveting when Sri Lanka were 144 for 6, but Tharanga and lower order gave us a final worth remembering. We move to Adelaide for the next final, on March 6. See you then. Go
Brydon Coverdale's report is being updated. We'll get you the details from the presentation ceremony in a bit.

An exciting finish to a game that appeared to be one-sided when Sri Lanka were reduced to 144 for 6 in the chase. Kulasekara triggered the fightback in the company of Tharanga, the former the aggressor and Tharanga the anchor who was expected to stay on till the end. Prasad kept the fight on with Tharanga but Thara
Australia won by 15 runs
Player of the match is David Warner, AUS
